alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued January 11 at 7:06PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The Northwest Avalanche Center in Seattle has issued an Avalanche Warning... * WHAT...High avalanche danger will develop Wednesday night and Thursday. * WHERE...West slopes of the Cascades from the Canadian Border to King County including the mountains in the Mt Baker Area, Hwy 542, Hwy 20 West, and the Mountain Loop Hwy. * WHEN...In effect from 18:00 PST Wed Jan 11th through 18:00 PST Thu Jan 12th . * PRECAUTIONARY / PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Very dangerous avalanche conditions are expected. Travel in avalanche terrain in not recommended. Avalanches may run long distances and can run into mature forests, valley floors, or flat terrain. Consult https://www.nwac.us/ or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center. DAMICO

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
